languages.text: "Когда Вашей Светлости будет удобно, прошу принять меня для личной аудиенции. Вашего внимания требует некая приятная забота".

traits.locale_text: "Когда Вашему благородию будет удобно, прошу принять меня для личной аудиенции. Вашего внимания требует некая приятная забота".

languages.text: "I request a personal audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} whenever it is convenient. There is a rather pleasant matter that requires your attention."
languages.original_text: "Когда Вашей Светлости будет удобно, прошу принять меня для личной аудиенции. Вашего внимания требует некая приятная забота".

traits.locale_text: "I ask for a personal audience with Your Nobleness whenever it is convenient. There is a certain pleasant business that requires your attention."
"I ask for a personal audience with Your Nobleness whenever it is convenient. There is a certain pleasant business that requires your attention."
"I request a personal audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} whenever it is convenient. There is a rather pleasant matter that requires your attention."
"I request a personal audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} whenever it is convenient. There is a rather pleasant matter that requires your attention."
"I request a personal audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} whenever it is convenient. There is a rather pleasant matter that requires your attention."

languages.text: “等您什么时候方便，大人，我希望能与您进行一场私人会谈。有件很令人愉快的事情需要您的关注。”
languages.original_text: "I request a personal audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} whenever it is convenient. There is a rather pleasant matter that requires your attention."

traits.locale_text: “等您什么时候方便，大人，我希望能与您进行一场私人会谈。有件很令人愉快的事情需要您的关注。”

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, me gustaría solicitar una audiencia personal cuando le convenga. Hay un asunto placentero que requiere su atención».
languages.original_text: "I request a personal audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} whenever it is convenient. There is a rather pleasant matter that requires your attention."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, me gustaría solicitar una audiencia personal cuando le convenga. Hay un asunto placentero que requiere su atención».

languages.text: "Ich bitte um eine persönliche Audienz bei Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, wann es mir passt. Es gibt eine recht angenehme Angelegenheit, die Eure Aufmerksamkeit erfordert."
languages.original_text: "I request a personal audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} whenever it is convenient. There is a rather pleasant matter that requires your attention."

traits.locale_text: "I request a personal audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} whenever it is convenient. There is a rather pleasant matter that requires your attention."

languages.text: « Je prie Votre Seigneurie de bien vouloir m'accorder une audience lorsqu'il lui plaira. Une affaire fort plaisante requiert votre attention. »
languages.original_text: "I request a personal audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} whenever it is convenient. There is a rather pleasant matter that requires your attention."

traits.locale_text: « Je prie Votre Seigneurie de bien vouloir m'accorder une audience lorsqu'il lui plaira. Une affaire fort plaisante requiert votre attention. »

languages.text: 「いつでもご都合のつくときに、陛下に直接謁見したく願います。陛下に聞いていただきたい、とても愉快な話があるのです」
languages.original_text: "I request a personal audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} whenever it is convenient. There is a rather pleasant matter that requires your attention."

traits.locale_text: 「いつでもご都合のつくときに、陛下に直接謁見したく願います。陛下に聞いていただきたい、とても愉快な話があるのです」

languages.text: "Uygun olduğunda {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'yle şahsen bir görüşme yapmak isterim. İlgilenmeniz gereken oldukça güzel bir gelişme söz konusu."
languages.original_text: "I request a personal audience with Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} whenever it is convenient. There is a rather pleasant matter that requires your attention."
